name: 4C/5C Campaign Completeness Report
description: Audit to identify missing strategic elements in campaigns
value: Prevents wasted marketing budget by highlighting gaps in strategy
whoSearches: Brand strategists, CMOs, Strategic planners, Marketing directors, Brand managers
whyNeeded: Incomplete strategies lead to wasted ad spend and missed ROI

name: Competitor Strategy Insights Report
description: Decodes competitor strategies to reveal why they win customers
value: Helps clients improve their campaigns and retain market share
whoSearches: CMOs, Brand Managers losing market share, Product marketers, Strategic planners
whyNeeded: Boards demand explanations for competitor success and actionable responses

name: Gen-Z Trend Cultural Signals Report
description: Analyzes youth culture to bridge generational marketing gaps
value: Ensures campaigns connect with younger demographics, improving engagement and revenue
whoSearches: Brand managers, Social media managers, Product marketers, Creative directors, Innovation teams
whyNeeded: Revenue declines in 18-25 segment due to misaligned messaging

name: Brand Equity Measurement Report
description: Measures effectiveness of brand equity building efforts with Brand Pyramid Analysis
value: Provides actionable insights to strengthen brand value and justify marketing spend
whoSearches: Brand managers, Marketing directors, Corporate strategists, Brand architects
whyNeeded: Boards demand proof of ROI for brand investments

name: Brand Key Campaign Alignment Workshop
description: Checks alignment of campaign messaging with brand strategy
value: Ensures campaigns are strategically aligned and maximize impact
whoSearches: CPG brand managers, Agency strategists, Marketing directors, Brand architects
whyNeeded: Misaligned campaigns reduce brand credibility and sales

name: Benefit Ladder Emotional Mapping Report
description: Maps emotional progression of campaign messaging
value: Helps campaigns create stronger emotional connections with audiences
whoSearches: Product managers, Creative directors, Brand strategists, CMOs
whyNeeded: Campaigns stuck at functional level fail to engage consumers

name: Brand Consistency Audit Report
description: Evaluates consistency of brand expression across campaigns with Brand House Analysis
value: Prevents brand confusion and strengthens recognition
whoSearches: Brand architects, Corporate marketing teams, CMOs, Brand managers
whyNeeded: Inconsistent brand messaging confuses customers and reduces trust

name: Purpose Communication Clarity Workshop
description: Checks if campaigns communicate brand purpose effectively
value: Ensures campaigns inspire and engage audiences by focusing on 'Why'
whoSearches: Purpose-driven marketers, Leadership coaches, Brand strategists, CMOs
whyNeeded: Brands focusing only on 'What' limit impact and engagement

name: Brand Archetype Authenticity Report
description: Evaluates whether campaigns reflect the correct brand personality
value: Prevents mixed signals that confuse brand identity
whoSearches: Brand personality specialists, Creative strategists, Brand managers, CMOs
whyNeeded: Inconsistent archetype usage reduces brand clarity and loyalty

name: GET/WHO/TO/BY Campaign Clarity Execution Report
description: Ensures campaigns have clear tactical objectives with GET/WHO/TO/BY Analysis
value: Prevents wasted ad spend due to unclear campaign direction
whoSearches: Performance marketers, Campaign managers, Brand strategists, Marketing directors
whyNeeded: Unclear objectives destroy campaign ROI and client confidence

name: Aaker Brand Equity Insights Report
description: Assesses brand strength and equity building effectiveness
value: Provides measurable proof of brand value for investment decisions
whoSearches: Brand equity researchers, Corporate strategists, CMOs, Brand managers
whyNeeded: Boards require validated frameworks to justify marketing budgets

name: AIDA Conversion Funnel Report
description: Analyzes campaign conversion at each stage
value: Identifies leaks in the funnel to improve conversion and revenue
whoSearches: Direct response marketers, E-commerce managers, Brand strategists, Performance marketers
whyNeeded: Campaigns lose prospects at various stages, lowering ROI

name: Crisis Messaging Risk Report
description: Prevents PR disasters by analyzing messaging risk
value: Protects brand reputation and prevents revenue loss from backlash
whoSearches: Legal teams, CMOs, Agency account directors, Brand strategists
whyNeeded: Viral backlash can destroy years of brand building

name: Conversion Leak Fix Report
description: Detects and fixes points where campaigns lose conversions
value: Increases revenue by fixing campaign performance leaks
whoSearches: Performance marketers, E-commerce directors, Brand strategists, Marketing directors
whyNeeded: Poor conversion rates waste ad spend and reduce income

name: Social Media Platform Performance Optimization Report
description: Optimizes creatives for each Social Media platform channel
value: Maximizes engagement and ROI by platform-specific adjustments
whoSearches: Social media managers, Creative directors, Brand strategists, Marketing directors
whyNeeded: Same creative performs differently across channels, lowering results

name: Innovation Storytelling Workshop
description: Positions new products as revolutionary in the market
value: Prevents failed launches and boosts product adoption
whoSearches: Product marketers, Innovation teams, Startup founders, Brand strategists, CMOs
whyNeeded: Poor launch positioning leads to revenue loss and market failure

name: Ethical Messaging Compliance Report
description: Checks campaigns for ethical and emotional manipulation risks
value: Prevents consumer backlash and reputational damage
whoSearches: Legal teams, Ethics officers, Brand safety managers, CMOs, Brand strategists
whyNeeded: Unethical messaging destroys trust and long-term revenue

name: Cultural Adaptation Market Report
description: Ensures campaigns are culturally appropriate for each market
value: Prevents brand missteps and ensures successful global market entry
whoSearches: Global brand managers, International marketing directors, Brand strategists, CMOs
whyNeeded: Cultural insensitivity leads to market rejection and loss of revenue

name: Influencer ROI Prediction Report
description: Analyzes influencer partnerships for ROI potential
value: Avoids costly partnerships and maximizes marketing spend efficiency
whoSearches: Social media managers, Influencer marketing specialists, Brand strategists, Marketing directors
whyNeeded: Fake or poor-performing influencers waste large budgets

name: Regulatory Compliance Creative Audit
description: Checks campaigns for adherence to regulations and legal standards
value: Prevents fines, legal issues, and reputational damage
whoSearches: Legal departments, Compliance officers, Pharmaceutical marketers, Brand strategists
whyNeeded: Regulatory violations can lead to costly fines and brand damage
